# frameAnalysisSpacing

**Instance Property**

The reciprocal of the maximum rate to process buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
var frameAnalysisSpacing: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

The request won’t process buffers that fall within the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/StatefulRequest/frameAnalysisSpacing] since the previously performed analysis. The analysis isn’t done by wall time but by analysis of the time stamps of the sample buffers the request processes.

## Inspecting the request

- **minimumLatencyFrameCount**: The minimum number of frames that the request has to process before reporting any observations.
